Subject: Upgrade to latest version - Worthwhile?
Description:
I can see there is an update to our version of StealthAUDIT and want to know if it is beneficial for us to upgrade to the latest version, and the process I would need to follow to complete this. Please could information be provided on this?

One of the big requests on our side is to have a better review process for data owners, so it would be good to know if there are any improvements to this and the reporting provided.

Require an explanation about 11.6
^Guidance/Request ticket, thus first response email template is not used.
